title: Loves maistresse: or, The Queens masque As it was three times presented before their two Excellent Maiesties, within the space of eight dayes; in the presence of sundry forraigne ambassadors. Publikely acted by the Queens Comœdians, at the Phœnix in Drury-Lane. Written by Thomas Heywood.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publisher: Printed by Robert Raworth, for Iohn Crowch; and are to bee sold by Iasper Emery, at the signe of the Eagle and Child, in Pauls Church-yard,
